titleStmt.title: Troilus and Cressida, or, Truth found too late a tragedy, as it is acted at the Dukes Theatre : to which is prefix'd, a preface containing the grounds of criticism in tragedy / written by John Dryden ...
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616. Troilus and Cressida.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Able Swall ..., and Jacob Tonson ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: verses to the author, signed R. Duke ([2] p. at end?) lacking in filmed copy.
An adaptation of Shakespeare's Troilus and Cressida, greatly altered.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
